data.text: It is better to eat a dry piece of bread and not have strife/quarrels
A slave who acts wisely will some day be the boss of his master’s disgraceful son
Workers put silver and gold in a very hot furnace to burn out what is impure,
Those who do what is evil pay attention to people who say [MTY] what is evil,
Those who make fun of poor people insult God, the one who made the poor people,
Old people are usually proud of [MET] their grandchildren,
Fine/Eloquent speech is not suitable for foolish people to say,
People think that a bribe is like a magic stone to persuade someone to do what they want him to do;
If you want people to like/love you, forgive them for the wrong things that they do to you.
Rebuking people who have good sense will accomplish more for them
Because wicked people are always trying to cause trouble,
A mother bear whose cubs have been taken away from her is dangerous,
If someone does something evil in return for something good being done to him,
Starting a quarrel is like allowing water to start to leak out of a dam;
There are two things that Yahweh hates:
It is useless to allow foolish people [RHQ] to try to become wise by paying for it,
Friends love others all the time,
If someone borrows money from another person, it is foolish for you to promise [IDM] that you will pay the money back
Those who like to sin also like to cause strife/trouble;
Those who ◄have perverse minds/are always thinking about doing evil things► will not prosper,
Children who are foolish soon cause their parents to be very sad;
Being cheerful is like swallowing good medicine;
Wicked people/judges accept bribes that are given to them secretly,
Those who have good sense determine to do what is wise,
Children who are foolish cause their father to be sad
It is not right to force someone who has done nothing wrong to pay a fine;
Those who have good sense do not talk a lot,
People may think that foolish people who do not say anything are wise;
